mapper.select: SELECT gs.GoodsTypeId ,gs.GoodsTypeName FROM goodstype gs INNER JOIN goodstypeflag gsf WHERE gs.GoodsTypeId = gsf.GoodsTypeId and gsf.GoodsTypeFlag = 1
SELECT GoodsId,GoodsName,GoodsInformation,GoodsPrice,GoodsStock FROM goods where GoodsType = ${GoodsTypeId} and GoodsPullOff = 1
SELECT GoodsId,GoodsName,GoodsInformation,GoodsPrice,GoodsStock FROM goods where GoodsName like '%${key}%' or GoodsId like '%${key}%' and GoodsPullOff = 1
